FileReaderReadAsText.summary:
The readAsText() method of the interface is used to read the contents of the specified or .
When the read operation is complete, the is changed to DONE,
the event is triggered, and the property contains the contents of the file as a text string.

blockquote.para: Note: The method is a newer promise-based API to read a file as text.
Note: This method loads the entire file's content into memory and is not suitable for large files. Prefer readAsArrayBuffer() for large files.
